content: you can find this pattern free on my blog https //aknottyhabitdesigns com/crossroads-wristlet-strap/ just a quick and super easy wristlet strap pattern that would be a perfect item for your summer markets what you need -4 5 mm crochet hook or hook to obtain gauge -any dk weight yarn i used avery lane creations - crochet everything hand dyed cotton/wool blend -1 inch d-ring -1 inch lobster claw yarn needle -measuring tape -scissors this is for the written crochet pattern only due to the nature of this purchase no refunds will be accepted
